getChecksumInstance

public static AbstractChecksum getChecksumInstance(java.lang.String algorithm)
                                            throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
get an object of a checksum algoritm, always try to use fast implementations from the Java API

Parameters:
algorithm - code for the checksum algorithm
Returns:
a checksum algorithm object, returns null if algorithm is unknown
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

getChecksumInstance

public static AbstractChecksum getChecksumInstance(java.lang.String algorithm,
                                                   boolean alternate)
                                            throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
get an object of a checksum algoritm

Parameters:
algorithm - code for the checksum algorithm
alternate - use a pure Java implementation (only if available)
Returns:
a checksum algorithm object, returns null if algorithm is unknown
Throws:
java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
